import './register.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function Register() { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const res = await axios('/auth', { username, email, password, }) console.log(res) } return (
Register
setUsername(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} />
) }
